REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Caravan child
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was born into a nomadic family of caravan traders. HISCAP father, the caravan leader, taught HIM the caravan trade. Because HE was able to barter or hunt for all of HIS food, HE never had to worry about growing or gathering food. Later, when HIS father died NAME became the caravan leader.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Caravan straggler
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Growing up in a large nomadic tribal caravan, NAME often strayed behind the group, leaving HIM to explore...and get into trouble.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Trampled child
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: As a young child, NAME was caught in a muffalo stampede and was nearly crushed to death. HECAP survived, but now has an extreme fear of animals. While recuperating from HIS many injuries, HE discovered HE had a talent for healing and art.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Tribal princess
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Born a tribal princess, NAME spent HIS younger years pampered and protected by the tribe. Such a life teaches few skills and instills a lifelong aversion to manual labor--but NAME learned early the ways of social manipulation.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Chief's son
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: From a young age, NAME was trained to be a tribal leader. HECAP learned to hunt and fight from the tribe's most skilled hunters and bravest warriors. Due to HIS prominent position, NAME never knew manual labor or learned many skills.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Child hunter
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: From a young age, NAME followed HIS father on hunting trips, learning to track and trap the most elusive of animals.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Child healer
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: From a young age, NAME followed HIS tribe's elder healer, learning to scrounge up herbs and mineral compounds from the nearby area to use in surprisingly effective remedies.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Captive child
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: As a youg child, NAME was taken captive by an enemy tribe during a raid. HECAP was forced to do hard manual labour. Over time HIS new tribe became like family and HE was adopted as one of their own.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Mute
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was greatly affected by a traumatic event early in HIS life. For many years HE refused to speak to anyone, preferring instead to spend time with HIS tribe's animals.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Fire-scarred child
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was an active child who lived an uneventful childhood until HE fell into a fire and suffered horrific burns to HIS hands and arms. Although the scars have faded, HE can't bear to be in close proximity to fire.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Sole survivor
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME's entire tribe was wiped out by a mysterious disease. Found alone and adopted by another band, HE never became close with other tribe members. HECAP preferred to stay away from HIS new home, wandering the woods and tending the animals.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Wolf pack member
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was discarded by HIS family. Raised by wolves, HE ran, hunted, and defended HIS pack. HECAP learned to fight efficiently by tooth and claw. HECAP also learned brutally effective primal hunting strategies.
